sub_title: Experienced BIM Manager/BIM evangelist/BIM tools trainer
summary:
10 years of experience in implementing and executing BIM on large scale projects in the United Arab Emirates. extensive knowledge of BIM processes, Revit, Navisworks, BIM 360 and PowerBI. Also proficient in training resources in usage of BIM software tools.

Instrumental in setting up back offices in the Far East (Philippines) for the production of BIM deliverables using BIM 360 as the collaboration platform.
